changelog.title: Master Key System
changelog.description: A hidden secret grants temporary full access. Discover it if you can...

changelog.title: 4 New Security Tool Training Labs
changelog.description: Hydra, SQLMap, Gobuster, and Nikto - password attacks, SQL injection, directory enumeration, and vulnerability scanning.

changelog.title: 6 New Security Tool Training Labs
changelog.description: John the Ripper, Hashcat, Nmap, Metasploit, Burp Suite, and YARA rules - all with interactive simulators.

changelog.title: Wireshark Training Lab
changelog.description: Comprehensive interactive Wireshark module: filter simulator, 10 challenges, autocomplete, progress tracking.

changelog.title: Dark Arts Vault Expansion
changelog.description: Massive content update: Gate 6 & 7, 5 new modules, Analysis Toolkit, and Dark Arts Quiz.

changelog.title: 100+ Auto-Graded Challenges
changelog.description: Interactive challenges across all tool training labs with hints, points, and progress tracking.
